summary: Full-stack application managing aviation operations including user authentication, aircraft tracking, and payment processing. Recommend analyzing user-authentication module first due to P0 priority and lack of test coverage.

modules.name: User Authentication
modules.businessPurpose: Handles user signup, login, password reset, and session management

modules.name: Aircraft Management
modules.businessPurpose: Aircraft registration, tracking, status updates, and certification management

modules.name: Payment Processing
modules.businessPurpose: Handles transactions, refunds, payment methods via multiple gateways
